remarks: The vector sum operation for the constructed full vector space H. TODO: check if this will shorten proofs that use ~ dvhopvadd and/or ~ dvhfplusr .  (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dvhopvadd2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhopvadd2.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhopvadd2.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhopvadd2.p $e |- .+ = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> ( ( s ` f ) o. ( t ` f ) ) ) ) $.
dvhopvadd2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhopvadd2.s $e |- .+b = ( +g ` U ) $.
dvhopvadd2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ Q e. E ) /\ ( G e. T /\ R e. E ) ) -> ( <. F , Q >. .+b <. G , R >. ) = <. ( F o. G ) , ( Q .+ R ) >. ) $.
$d E s t $.
$d H f $.
$d K f s t $.
$d W f s t $.
